content.detailedDescription: Was on holiday with my girlfriend in taormina (sicily), got back to the hotel at 2am which was situated high in the mountain where we had the best view to watch the volcano, couldnt sleep straight away, so i went out in the veranda and lay on the sunbed. was just looking up in the sky and all of a sudden i saw a ball of red light very far away.  it sped like a flash but i could keep my eyes on it. comparing to a plane, i would say it was at least 50 times faster.  its flight path was like a zigzag motion.  it than sped towards the volcano mount etna, and just hovered over the volcano for at least 5 mins, than just shot off the same way it came from. my reaction was to wake up my girl, but she saw nothing and was skeptical!
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo hovering over volcano in sicily

content.detailedDescription: C'etait durant la chasse ou nord de forestville plus precisement reservoir pikmuakan j'ai etã© seul je conduiser sur un chemin forestier quand j'ai vue dans un tournant une lumiere blanche qui flashã© sequantielement j'ai arretã© pour observã© avec des jumelles c'ã©tã© a plus de 1 milles de moi et la j'ai vu une chose debout a meme distance je pensais avant que c'etait quelqu'un avec une veste reflechissantes et l'objet ovale par apres est comme descendue est dans un faisseau lumineux plus rien la chose que j'avais vu etait comme aspirã© pis l'objet est restã© stationnaire dix minute au plus pis est partis vers le nw j'ai pas eu peur j'etais meme emerveillã© d'avoir etã© temoin de ca wow
content.summary: C'etait ovale sans bout aplatis avec des lumieres blanche couleur grisatre

content.detailedDescription: I went out of our house to get the dog and there was a saturated orange colored object just below cloud cover basically in front of the house.  it moved very slowly from north to south.  we are 1/10th of a mile from the ocean so it could have been moving south from town neck beach in sandwich.  the strangest thing about it was about after 3 minutes it turned white for about 45 seconds, and then turned back to the deep orange.  it's edges were clearly delineated, and i watched for the full 4.5 minutes until it disappeared into the cloud cover.  i was thrilled, not scared at all.  i did not sense any kind of harmful intent.  in fact, i wondered if it might be some kind of alien drone as i did not get a sense of any living connection either--but that's completely subjective.  i also have no idea of the size as it was below cloud cover during the time i was watching it and i don't know how low the clouds were that day.  i feel very lucky to have seen this ship.  and when i looked at nuforc sighting logs, there had been two sightings previously, both a few days before, but not on the same day.  one was in barnstable and the other was in sandwich, ma.
content.summary: Change color from a saturated orange back to white.  moved very slowly stopping twice.  i reported when it happened on nuforc but wanted it here too.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen these guys before but this time something went very wrong.  i was not supposed to wake up but i did.  there were 3 of them.  when i woke i could see the taller one gasp and put his hand to his mouth.  the smaller one ran  very fast to my side of the bed.  i could turn my head but not move my body.  his little mouth was shaped in an "o" and arms out to his side.  there was another at my bedside but i did not see his face as i turned my head all i saw was a dim light and i went out.  i woke up in a pool of water as if my water had broke (i have given birth before and knew what was going on.)  i got up threw my pj bottoms in the shower wiped down and put clean ones on.  i was a bit groggy.  got a towel and laid in on the bed, the sheets were wet.  i had to get up the next day and go to work and just got back in bed.  our two dogs that sleep with us did not wake up not even when i got up to go to the bathroom nor did bob (my husband).  the next morning the bed was dry.  no evidence of any water.  no mark, nothing.  my pj bottoms were still wet when i check them.  i just got dressed and went to work.  my co-worker asked if i was all right as i was not my perkie self.  i told her i had a bad night then told her what had happened.  she wanted me to talk to someone at cal tech but i refused.  i did not and do not want people poking me or looking into my bedroom. i don't want to chase them away nor do i want any government official start to follow me around or abduct me because i "know too much" i am not happy that this is viewable by the public as i am more afraid of them than i am of the brown guys.  and yes they are brownish in color.  i believe it has something to do with their height.  the smaller one was grayish and the taller one was brown.  i asked to see them again and they did.
content.summary: Was not an aircraft they were in my bedroom

content.detailedDescription: We were headed to a poker game going east on brewer drive on the night of january 29th, when i noticed three very bright lights in the sky. at first we thought it was a blimp because it was moving slow and it was the nhl allstar weekend downtown. as we got closer to nolensville pike, i knew it wasn't a blimp. it definitely wasn't a plane, it was moving too slow. we turned south on nolensville pike toward old hickory blvd.  i told my buddy to stop the car and we got out to see it better, there was no noise whatsoever. it was triangle in shape and the lights were pretty bright. it seemed to hover for a minute and then started moving very slow to the north. now this is a busy area of nashville, so i was very surprised to see an object like this in such a populated area. we lost sight of it as we were driving on. i'm a huge airplane guy, and can tell you right now it wasn't a plane or a helicopter. i don't know what it was, but the experience was pretty amazing!!!
content.summary: A black triangular mass with three lights

content.detailedDescription:
On the 10th of august 2014 , observed (by chance ?) a silver coloured ufo in the daytime - between 6:11:15 pm - 6:12:55 pm as recorded on my digital camera . the object visibly experienced some problems & it tumbled at times , tried to regain the path & at 1 point changed the direction of going towards exact south then it disappeared then it appeared with its shape again looking different , it then in a semi u-turn 'floated' while quickly turning & at lower elevation now towards exact west , the heavy white smog-clouds made the object fuzzy at that point . while the silver object was above the building (as per the photo # 1 attached ) an airplane has came in to view from the same es direction as the ufo first did when 1st observed, the plain slowed & in a wide curve flight path seemed to be observing this object tumbling & ever changing object . the ufo's surface did reflected light from the sun as well when it would pop-in to be visible , on & off . i've noticed once that it had a dome on top too , unfortunately couldn't take photos fast enough in such a brief time frame , lucky though i still was able to snap 3 photos . 
the 1st photo taken is included in this report as is the close-up of this object :)
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Daytime , silver ufo with visible tumbling during flight path as if it had some trouble , quickly took photos of this event

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home watching tv and as become more darker outside just went 
out on balcony to check the weather as almost all day was raining with 
low dark clouds.When i first step on balcony i just looked toward the sky
at southern direction as bad weather came from that side. my attention 
was driven to the burning red-orange light just under the base of one tick black cloud.It was circle shape and let say large like flying balloon.It was almost stationary at altitude approximately 800 meter.
as i looked at that it start easily descent and then all that bright
burning light disappeared and object start moving so slowly to sw direction totally dark.When it was above the hill opposite to my house
it stopped and start descending first so slowly then more faster until
it disappear behind the hill.All that appearances last five minutes.
during that time there was not any sound registered, and no one signal
lights (red,green,white)haven't been observed like on normal aircraft.
content.summary: Like disc shape without any sound

content.detailedDescription: I was at home cleaning my room and noticed to blue ish white lights in the distance outside my window, i looked at the lights as they didn't seem like a plane or helicopter, the lights seemed to go at a steady path at first but then shot backwards very quickly, then they sort of moved around each other and then just disappeared quickly all within a few minutes
content.summary: Wierd blue lights that moved around sporadically

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Red glow from distance through field glasses turned old copper pastel green stopped performed similar military manouvers then shotout  into space i counted one thou. one to one thou four it was out of sight.No.1 iwas sitting at my back sheed playing with my motorcycle.No2i thought it was a airplane with missed up lights no port or starboard keeped comeing closer that's wen i got my field glasses out starting to look closer no4the craft was large came to a stop.Made a abrupt r. turn. stoped.Turned.L.About500.Ft stoped. went back on same path. stoped traveld about 500 to 800 ft shot out to north sky no5for the first time i actually seen a real ufo since then i seen 4 others same aera others over ocean at holden beach while we were fishing all at night.My neighbor was with me now i look for them any time i am there
content.summary: From east changed dir 6 times

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work and taking my normal route. at exactly 5:43 am i saw an object in the sky hovering at about 500ft from the ground. i pulled over since i noticed that the object was not moving. i noticed the object since it had 4 red lights on each corner and a blinking white light in the center. at first i thought it was a plane in the distance but as i got closer i realized that it was not. my second thought was that it was some sort of drone, which was not the case either since the object was rather large, about the size of a car. the next thing i noticed is that the object was sort of a transparent color, so with the dark color of the sky at 5 am, it appeared black. the object did not move while i was observing it. as i was leaving, the object was still stationary until it was out of my sight. i asked coworkers that take the same route but take the route at a later time and they said that they did not notice anything. so i deducted that this object was stationary there for about 30 minutes. i waited to see if there were reports on anything seen since there was heavy traffic on the highway rather close to the location.
content.summary: Hovering black object with 4 red lights and a blinking white light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work and i noticed lights to my right that seemed too low for an airplane so it caught my attention. i then noticed they aren't moving and then saw two sets of lights so i pulled over to get a better look of what i was seeing. at first i thought are these helecopters hovering. i studied the crafts couple of minutes, there were lights on what could be the tail and i could see the shape like a long oval it looked black, this was right before sunrise so still dark out, i thought to myself if these are helecopters they are big, they also were completely still and i couldn't hear any sound. then one of them moved to the front of the other, then completely still again. i then thought i should take a video, and tried to but then decided not to. i watched a couple more minutes then decided to leave and go to work. when i got home later that day i told my husband about it, i asked him if he thought it was some high tech black helecopters and he said no, and if that existed they wouldn't be around here, i don't know why i decided not to video this.I'm reporting this because i'm not sure of what i saw, i have had a sighting several years ago and i was 100 percent sure what i saw, but with this sighting i'm not.
content.summary: I was going to work and noticed stationary lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I walked towards my house and a friend had just arrived and she pointed up at the sky while asking what are those things. i first observed 4 or 5 red orbs traveling south above us and then i looked to see more of them coming from the area of the lake, which was about 2 miles to the west. they were traveling diagonally in relation to the others.Then they all traveled in a straight line due south at accelerated speed.
content.summary: Observed red orange orbs true south.
Teleporting man, li

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with my colleague when i noticed a black kite-shaped object hovering on the city (8:30 am). at first i thought it was a helicopter, but then i heard no sound from the vehicle. this object fluttered all the time, turning on itself. i was surprised at what i saw, because i realized the object couldn't be a helicopter. i took a picture of it in time, after i arrived at my office, because it could be seen through the window. i wanted to take a video with a professional video camera in order to obtain better images, but the object had gone.
content.summary: The object was hovering high in the sky, above the city. sometimes it rotated on itself, looking towards the sea.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from campus, it was right after 8:30 pm, and i was on the road i live on, which is a back road, about 5 miles outside of the military base. in the sky i saw three bright lights to my left, overtop of the trees that line the side of the road next to a farm. i approached going about 45 mph, i thought it was weird how low that plane seemed to be, but i thought somehow it must be off in the distance. i realized this couldn't be because the three lights were too large. as i got even closer i realized that whatever it was, it was right above the tree line, and did not appear to be moving; just hovering in its place. i started to slow to a halt, as this was a back road and i was the only car on the road. i stopped at the bottom of the local farm's driveway, at the most only 40 feet away from the flying object. i was scared for a second because i knew they saw me, and they knew i was slowing down to get a better look. through the tree line, i tried to identify the tail, which would have to be the back light, because the ship was facing the road at about a 45 degree angle, with the two bright lights on either side where i would have thought the wings would have been (triangular in shape) were facing toward me at an angle. it did not appear to be a normal plane, nor was it behaving like any plane i have ever heard of before. this was about 5 miles outside of joint base mdl, on the fort dix side of the base. even though i live so close to the base, planes are not that common above this road, at least not directly above; the air fields are not on this side of the base. this ship was about 3 to 4 stories off the ground, right above the tree line. i grabbed my phone to try and get a picture, but i started to turn around since i passed it slightly to get to the driveway, and i couldn't turn and use my phone at the same time. in the minute it took me to turn around, i could still see the brightness cast from the three lights. this is a back road with no other lights, which is how i knew it was still there. as soon as i had fully turned around to see it straight on again, it was gone in a second. i did not see it move or accelerate at any rate. it went from hovering in its place, to gone. i was in complete shock because i was still trying to convince myself that this was a small plane. i drove forward for maybe another 30 seconds before i stopped my car to search the sky. i saw faint lights way off in the distance. i searched the sky for any other lights to make sure that was it; it was cloudy tonight so i hadn't seen any stars or other planes moment before viewing these lights. i knew that those three lights were the lights i was seeing off in the distance. it had to have been at least 2-3 miles away, but most likely a few more. i felt like it only sped off because i had stopped so close to it and it did not want to be observed. i sat in my car for a few seconds still in disbelief, trying to come up with another explanation for what i saw, but i couldn't. no plane, or military plane comes off base and decides to hover over a random line of trees; i've never seen the military run any tests over us before, and i've lived here for over 8 years once my dad retired as a high ranking officer from the military. the whole sighting lasted under 5 minutes, and once the lights were barely visible i turned back around and drove the 1/4 mile home. i went straight in to find my dad and ask him what that space ship could have been if it belonged to the military. he said maybe a drone, but it was the size of a small plane and hovered in the same spot for at least 2 minutes that i observed, but i have no idea how long it had been there before i came down the road. i called my sister to tell her what happened, even though i thought i was going to sound insane. to some level i think she thought i was just because this was such a freak sighting, but she told me that she had seen lights in this area that were there in one second, and gone in the next. no drone i have ever heard of can disappear from sight in one second and appear far off the distance in an instant. i have observed mysterious lights before myself in the past, but nothing that was this unexplainable, or right in front of my face. this occurred right before my eyes, and there is no denying that it was there. whatever i saw was real, and i don't think it wanted to be seen.
content.summary: I saw a triangular shaped object hovering overtop of the trees. when i drove up right next to it, it disappeared in an instant before i saw it appear again off in the distance.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to the restroom and this light caught my eye out the window towards the south.  i looked out and after further observation i noticed it was not moving and the lights were pulsing.  i texted my brother who came over and also saw the object.  then we noticed to the southwest, another appeared.  at first i thought it was a satellite perhaps.  the object was long and v shaped.  it had white lights that pulsed and there was a light towards the bottom center that appeared blue/green.  it hovered in the same spot for awhile and would abruptly move upwards then descend.  when i first saw it, it abruptly disappeared for approximately two minutes but reappeared just as quickly.  there was cloud cover but you could still see it through the clouds.  it hovered in the same spot but when i tool a picture and my phone flashed, it moved closer to my house and honestly scared the heck out of me.  my brother also took a picture and his picture shows three in the same spot where i got a picture of a single object.  i did not alert police because i didnt want them to think i was crazy but i know what i saw was not an airplane or helicopter or anything like that.
content.summary: Two unknown objects in sky over my house

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were driving down the road about 9:30 at night when she spotted lights in the sky i've never believed in ufo services such i ignored them but then they became so why i know there's something out there that was not home or we watched it and forwarded it lasted over 40 minutes they were bright lights they became one then divided up into twos and fours and sixes changed colors and helicopters are flying around with their spot lights and they look like as compared to them we called the police department to find out they had not had any complaints but this cannot be true we were put on hold and we were told that we were the only ones that i called and people are standing outside on the side of the road videotaping and we have some few videos sorry about the language but i hope i got all excited that's about it we saw them twice in the same spot within a two week period it lasted for about 30 to 40 minutes to first time and we followed it stand about 15 it made me feel very calm and peaceful at first i was scared but then he gave a calming effect and i can't wait to see more i feel like it's a good life and nothing bad or scary about it if i hadn't seen it with my own eyes i would have never believed to have never believed in any of this sort of thing before but when she see it there's no denying
content.summary: Daughter 17yrs old and i were driving she noticed the lights. ive bever believed in any ufos kr such!. but definitely do believe theres something not manmade out there now. if i hadn't seen it with my ownbeyes i would have never be able to be convinced we

i know what i saw so ya can forget me filling out all the crap, at the beginning if your sight!
not like i'm proud of seeming such things of ridicule. so call me email me whatever. i know 
u really can't change the experiences sometime dam out
frighting!!! but not missing time or abductions. up

about personal stuff!! just reporting i'll never be patient enough
to endure the top questions so i don't care people do what, the must w/ my
info!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: I already have rather not live them ivette and over they were what they were. in simple nglush!

content.detailedDescription: Heard a jet fly over, then i saw one object move slowly, and another move slowly behind trees, and saw two small objects rad and whit blinking, they move slowly no noise, and were gone. no noise.
content.summary: Looked out window saw two objects moving, and two small ones blinking

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work. i noticed in the sky it looked like the sky was filled with hundreds of large orange stars. they were not stars. i noticed that they began traveling from the south to the north. hundreds of them popping up and moving for five minutes in duration. people were getting out of their cars, pulling over, out in the street. hundreds of witnesses.
it looked like fire ball orange orbs traveling completely in silence and close to one another . too close for planes. some were stacked above one another in four to five sequence pattern. i have some photos and video but poor quality. you can seed them though
content.summary: Hundreds of orange orbs traveling north from the south at different altitudes

content.detailedDescription:
My cousin said he was in south dakota a couple years ago with his daughter and took some pictures and the objects only appeared in one photo.
there are three in the background not noticed at the time of the incident.
content.summary: I am a mufon member, id number 23959.  my cousin contacted me on my face book and sent me a picture asking me what it was.  he knows i look into ufos and served at china lake research facility in the military and just wanted my opinion.

content.detailedDescription: Please help these craft have been over my house for 4 weeks now a couple of friends have seen things but everyone else thinks i'm nuts but i'm not the craft hide behind cloud at night you can see the white lites under them they blend in with sky so much reason i see them no idea they are emmiting green lasers which project small floating orbs i have many pics vids ive just been probed by two spinning laser beams i now feel funny not sure how please please someone help i don't know what is happening called police they said get off the phone there are emergencies going on my partner friends neighbours think i'm mad i need to talk to some one on phone typing is hurting my arms don't know why
content.summary: The black craft emmit green lasers projecting images of charactors

content.detailedDescription: Just happened to look out the window last night, we watched a light in the se sky from around 10 pm till after 12 am. went to bed then. it looked like a large star, but had colored lights on it, it would separate into 2 or orbs circle each other, move away from each other then come back together. this was feb 10th,2016 in north branch, michigan  first thought was that it was a large star or planet, until it separated into 2 and sometimes 3 parts, would kind of dance around each other, dart away from each other, then come back as one.
content.summary: strange light, breaking up and coming together

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was standing in formation with my company getting ready to go do pt (physical training) in the morning about 0500 hrs and a yellow circular bright lighted object show up in the sky, fairly close to my unit, it stayed there for a couple minutes then just separated into 3 different yellow circular objects and they all just sped off very quickly in the same general directions but slightly moving away from each other.  this was observed by my whole unit out on the basketball court that morning for pt formation, pretty much what we were doing in the formation stopped and we all watched this happen.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Standing in formation with my company and bright yellow light appeared then left.

content.detailedDescription:
1-me encontraba volviendo del trabajo
2-lo note tiempo después al revisar mi teléfono celular 
5-me hizo cuestionar muchas cosas del universo 
4-el objeto era color plata se encontraban en ascenso hacia el sol
3-recuerdo que cuando saque la foto sin ningún motivo aparente habia como un silencio al rededor mio sumado a un sentimiento raro dentro de mi
6-el objeto fue visto después de un tiempo al revizar mi celular
content.summary: Algo me impulso a sacar mi telefono y fotografiar el cielo ...Como si quisieran que sepasmos que estan y los vemos cuando ellos quieren
content.locationName: Buenos Aires, Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires

content.detailedDescription:
One night, as i was going to bed, i looked out my window. i noticed a light though my curtains, pastel blues and greens in the sky above the tree line of the empty lot next door to my house. now, i have seen a lot of things in the sky. this was like nothing i have seen before.
 i have always had an interest with anything that is airborne. i've been to air shows, living in hawaii you see your fare share of military aircraft, i can assure you this fitted none of those criteria..
when i first saw the orb, i didn't know what to think it was outer that a ufo.. the orb, danced in the sky. it moved form right to left, moving up and down, in that 'oh so impossible way' people describe orbs. i was in awe at the sight. it was a beautiful blue-green ball of light with flecks of orange red. i remember seeing a second orb in the sky that didn't move as much as the first orb, as i think back on it now, the second one might of been a star. but i could be mistaken. the first orb sopped, moved, stopped again, then possibly continued its moment because at this point i closed my curtains and hid under my bed sheets thoroughly freaked out. i don't think the orb caused my mental distressed, that one was most likely on me.. after all i had just seen a ufo, i had a lot on my mind.
also, the night i saw the orb, was the night lenard nimoy died. so theirs that interesting coincidence..  
i took a sketch of the orb, but its nothing to wright about, not very detailed, just times and description of movements. i don't have it any more any ways.
content.summary: Blue-green orb sighted in hawaii kai approximately 1:11am  on february 26th 2015.

content.detailedDescription:
my girlfriend/ roommate was sitting out the back door of our suite having a smoke. when she was looking up at the stars she saw an unusual set of lights in the distance shaped like a triangle. she has lived in this area for many years and has never noticed anything like this in the past. she thought it was odd and out of place and told me about it when i got home from work the next day. she is a non believer in ufo's but thought this was odd enough to tell me about it.
  after finishing her cigarette she went back inside and to bed. i was wondering if anyone else had reported seeing anything like that in the north okanagan tuesday night at or around that time.
content.summary: Saw triangle shape lights houvering in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at the roof, daughter and i, a triangle began to approach from the mountains (w)  descend and changed path towards us, then i began to take pics, went up again and made a curve and headed to the ocean (e). the cats and dogs were very nervous and in guard, they do it all the time when ships approach, dogs in the street bark and my cats jump on us

we always see the shape with binoculars before we write it down and take pics, this night there were 8 ships

9.09 pm   w/e  disc  small  white
9.19 pm   w/e  triangle huge  white/red   got it on video
9.29 pm   w/e  disc  small  white
10.52 pm  e/w  disc  small  white  got it on video
11.00 pm  up/e disc  small  white
11.08 pm  up/e disc  small  red
11.18 pm  w/e  triangle big  white/red  got it on video
11.19 pm  up/e disc  small  white

all the ships lights make circles at the bottom, red and with, just white or red and orange, if we light them they flash back at us always
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle approaches, goes down, up again then headed to the ocean. 8 ships passed that night

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately,  midday on a beautiful sunny, clear blue sky day. 

i was leaving through my kitchen door to the back patio, on the step before exiting i saw a huge dark, seemingly stationery object in the sky. in a reflex, i quickly turned and picked up a camera from the kitchen table next to me.  instinctively, i just aimed the camera in the direction of the object and clicked to take the shot. instantaneously the object disappeared and i believed that i had not got the photo i was after. 

the roll of film got left to one side, not till some time later did it get developed. i noticed there was something on a photograph, sometime later when i then had photographic software i came across the photo put it in my computer and was able to look at a larger version of my photo. it was then, that i realized i had managed to get a picture of the object i’d seen earlier.

ever since i have been really curious to know what it was i saw that day, and took the photo of.
content.summary: Gilroy ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photos of the full moon on a friends porch and i captured a photo of the object. it appeared out of nowhere and it was there without moving, without sound for about 15 minutes.  i watched it gradually camoflouge with the sky. there was an odd feeling in the air. like static electricity. i felt tingly. it's hard to describe and it sounds crazy but i felt almost euphoric during the time i saw it. even before i saw it. i thought it was just bc it was a full moon and a beautiful night. maybe that is true. all i know is i know what i saw and i know i can not explain it as just some anomaly. when you see the photo, you be the judge.
content.summary: I was taking photos of the full moon on a friends porch and i captured a photo of the object. it appeared out of nowhere and it was there without moving, without sound for about 15 minutes.  i watched it gradually camoflouge with the sky.
